resume.title: ITCEN CTS Co., Ltd.
resume.description:
Security operations managed service for Nextrade and support for the Information Security Team

resume.title: Gaonnuri Information Systems Co., Ltd.
resume.description:
Designed and implemented security infrastructure for the Nextrade trading execution platform
‚Ä¢ Supported technical responses for Financial Services Commission production authorization review and established the security architecture

‚Ä¢ Built FortiGate HA architecture and formalized disaster recovery procedures
‚Ä¢ Technology: FortiGate, FortiManager, Linux, VMware

resume.title: Quant Investment Management Co., Ltd.
resume.description:
Operated cloud infrastructure security for an AI asset management platform
‚Ä¢ Managed and enhanced AWS security controls including IAM, Security Groups, and WAF

‚Ä¢ Built and operated Prometheus/Grafana-based security metrics dashboards
‚Ä¢ Technology: AWS, Terraform, Prometheus, Grafana

resume.title: FunNC Co., Ltd.
resume.description:
Led cloud migration and security hardening for an e-commerce service
‚Ä¢ Designed migration from on-premises environments to AWS VPC-based cloud architecture
‚Ä¢ Established EKS cluster security configurations and container vulnerability review processes
‚Ä¢ Automated security review stages in GitLab CI/CD pipelines

resume.title: Jointree Co., Ltd.

resume.title: Metanet M Platform Co., Ltd.

‚Ä¢ Technology: Ansible, VPN, Zabbix, Python

projects.title: Observability Platform
projects.tech: Grafana, Prometheus, Loki, Blackbox Exporter, Docker
projects.description: Homelab infrastructure monitoring platform with Prometheus metrics collection, Loki log aggregation, and Grafana visualization.

projects.title: n8n Automation
projects.description: Automated workflows for alerting, deployment, and data collection.

projects.title: Fortinet API Client
projects.description: Python library for querying FortiManager policies/routes and collecting FortiAnalyzer log statistics.

metrics.features: Policy lookup, route management, and log statistics
metrics.automation: 80% time reduction compared to manual operations

projects.title: Security Alert System
projects.description: Detects FortiGate events in Splunk and sends alerts through Slack Block Kit. Operates 32 detection rules.

metrics.responseTime: Alert within 30 seconds after event detection

projects.title: IP Blacklist Platform
projects.description: Collects and analyzes malicious IP intelligence, then provides dashboards. Built with Flask API and Next.js frontend.

projects.title: HYCU FSDS Autonomous Driving
projects.description: Autonomous driving system based on Formula Student Driverless Simulator. Uses LiDAR cone detection (Grid BFS), Pure Pursuit path tracking, and three-tier safety state machine control. Received an Excellence Award at Hanyang Cyber University Formula Competition.

achievements: Designed Nextrade ATS security infrastructure (passed Financial Services Commission production authorization)
Built integrated Splunk-FortiNet monitoring system (central firewall management and automated policy rollout)
Improved operations by introducing security infrastructure automation (Nextrade)
Reduced false positives through WAF/IPS policy optimization (Nextrade)
Built and operated an Observability platform with Grafana, Prometheus, and Loki
Built n8n workflow automation platform for repetitive operational tasks
Introduced Claude AI-based security threat analysis automation
Supported security readiness for robo-advisor testbed evaluation (Quant)
Built VPN security infrastructure for large-scale remote work environments (Metanet)
